Eyeless Crab.description: A crustacean without eyes that hunts by detecting vibrations.
Eyeless Crab.description_ko: 눈이 없는 갑각류. 진동을 감지하여 사냥한다.

Eyeless King Crab.description: A massive eyeless crab with crushing claws and thick carapace.
Eyeless King Crab.description_ko: 으스러뜨리는 집게발과 두꺼운 갑각을 가진 거대한 눈먼 게.

Cave Spider Crab.description: A crab with long spindly legs like a spider, dwelling in caves.
Cave Spider Crab.description_ko: 거미처럼 길고 가느다란 다리를 가진 동굴에 사는 게.

Hermit Crab.description: A small crab that lives in salvaged shells.

Giant Hermit Crab.description: A hermit crab grown large enough to use machinery as its shell.
Giant Hermit Crab.description_ko: 기계를 껍데기로 사용할 만큼 커진 소라게.

Mud Crab.description: A small crab that burrows in muddy riverbanks.
Mud Crab.description_ko: 진흙 강둑에 굴을 파는 작은 게.

Rock Crab.description: A crab with a shell that resembles a stone.

Snapping Crab.description: A crab with one oversized claw that makes a snapping sound.
Snapping Crab.description_ko: 딱 소리를 내는 커다란 집게발을 가진 게.

Coral Crab.description: A colorful crab that lives among coral formations.
Coral Crab.description_ko: 산호 사이에 사는 화려한 색의 게.

Crab Swarm.description: A scuttling mass of crabs moving as one.

Albino Crab.description: A pale cave-dwelling crab with sensitive antennae.
Albino Crab.description_ko: 민감한 더듬이를 가진 창백한 동굴 서식 게.

Glowing Crab.description: A bioluminescent crab that illuminates the depths.
